## Azure Deployment & Live Monitoring

### Live URLs

- **Frontend (Static Web App):** https://thankful-flower-03bd04e03.1.azurestaticapps.net
- **Backend (App Service):** https://litlabstudio-backend.azurewebsites.net

### One-Click Deploy (VS Code)

Use the VS Code task: **Sync, Install, and Build All** to prepare your code for deployment.

#### Deploy Frontend

Deployment is automatic from GitHub (main branch) to Azure Static Web Apps.
Push to main and Azure will build/deploy.

#### Deploy Backend

You can deploy backend code using Azure CLI or Git. Example:

```
git remote add azure https://<deployment-user>@litlabstudio-backend.scm.azurewebsites.net/litlabstudio-backend.git
git push azure main:master
```

Or use Azure CLI for advanced deployment.

### Live Monitoring

- **Frontend:** Check status in Azure Portal or visit the live URL.
- **Backend:** Check status in Azure Portal or visit the live URL.
  You can also use `az webapp show` and `az staticwebapp show` for live status in the terminal.

### Health Checks

Add health endpoints to your backend for automated monitoring (e.g., `/api/health`).

### Dashboard

For advanced monitoring, set up Azure Monitor or Application Insights in the Azure Portal for both frontend and backend.
